item.title: Oracle Siha Odg
item.description:
title: “Setup Oracle Data Guard in RAC” date: 2025-09-24 draft: false tags: [“Oracle”,“Data Guard”,“RAC”,“High Availability”] categories: [“Database”,“Operations”] summary: “Step-by-step guide for setting up Oracle Data Guard in a RAC environment, covering prerequisites, parameter configuration, network setup, standby instance creation, managed recovery, and verification.”

Setup Oracle Data Guard in RAC

ðŸ”‘ Summary

This guide provides a structured procedure for configuring Oracle Data Guard in a Real Application Clusters (RAC) environment. It includes prerequisites, database and parameter setup, listener and network configuration, preparing the standby instance, enabling managed recovery, and final verification. Following these steps ensures a robust disaster recovery solution with synchronized primary and standby databases.
